snippet: Another man and three teenagers were injured in the shooting; one of the teenagers was critically wounded.
abstract: Portland, Ore, police arrest Lonzo Murphy in relation to shooting outside Portland high school that wounded three teenagers and one man.
lead_paragraph: Another man and three teenagers were injured in the shooting; one of the teenagers was critically wounded.

headline.main: Oregon Police Officers Arrest Man in Shooting Outside Portland High School
headline.print_headline: Oregon Police Officers Arrest Man in Shooting Outside Portland High School
